Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management+Log.KPIS: Delivery Performance to Customer Request Date
Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management+Log.EXPLANATION: The percentage of deliveries made on or before the requested delivery date.
Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management+Log.FORMULA: (Number of Orders Delivered on Customer Request Date / Total Number of Orders) * 100

Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management+Log.EXPLANATION: The average cost of freight per unit shipped.
Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management+Log.FORMULA: Total Freight Cost / Total Units Shipped

Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management+Log.EXPLANATION: The percentage of orders delivered on or before the promised delivery date.
The variability in transit times for shipments.

Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management+Log.KPIS: Logistics Cost as a Percentage of Sales
Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management+Log.EXPLANATION: The proportion of sales revenue spent on logistics activities.
The percentage of total warehouse capacity that is utilized.
The percentage of orders that are processed correctly without errors.
Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management+Log.FORMULA: (Number of Accurate Orders / Total Number of Orders) * 100

Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management+Log.EXPLANATION: The effectiveness of transportation operations in terms of cost and performance.
Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management+Log.FORMULA: Total Distance Traveled / Total Fuel Consumed
